name: head
description:
The head command extracts the first N elements from an OSM file. Similar to Unix 'head' command but for OSM data. Supports:

- Filtering by element type (nodes/ways)
- Tag filtering
- Skip and limit for pagination

Useful for quick file inspection and testing.

options.--type: Element type: nodes, ways, all (default: all)
options.-f, --format: Output format: text, geojson, json, csv (default: text)
options.--skip: Skip first N elements before selecting

output:
Selected elements showing:
- Element ID and type
- Location coordinates
- Tags (first 10 shown in text mode)
